#!/usr/bin/env python3

import math

def main():
    # Read Input
    x = int(input())

    # Calc
    ans = math.ceil(math.log(x/100, 1.01))

    # Print Answer
    print(ans)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main() 

import math

def main():
    x = input()

    ans = math.log(x/100, 1.01)
    print(math.ceil(ans))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

x = int(input())
b = 100
i = 0

while b < x:
    b += b // 100
    i += 1

print(i)

import math

def main():
    # Read Input
    x = int(input())

    # Calc
    ans = math.ceil(math.log(x/100, 1.01))

    # Print Answer
    print(ans)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
